sentences.en: A cholera plague had been killing many prisoners of war at the time.
sentences.cn: 当时霍乱疫情已在夺去很多战俘的生命。

sentences.en: An inoculation against cholera is recommended.
sentences.cn: 建议注射预防霍乱的疫苗。

sentences.en: Cholera has carried off half the people in the village.
sentences.cn: 霍乱夺走了村里一半人的生命.

sentences.en: Cholera spread like wildfire through the camps.
sentences.cn: 霍乱在营地里迅速传播.

sentences.en: Conditions were ripe for an outbreak of cholera.
Fears are growing of a cholera outbreak following the appearance of a number of cases in the city.
sentences.cn: 该市出现几起霍乱病例之后，人们对霍乱爆发的恐惧越来越强烈。

sentences.en: In Peru, a cholera outbreak continues to spread.
sentences.cn: 霍乱在秘鲁各地相继爆发。

sentences.en: People began to feel alarmed about the cholera.
sentences.cn: 人们开始对霍乱感到惊恐起来.

sentences.en: The cholera outbreak has been contained.
sentences.cn: 霍乱的发生已被控制住了.

sentences.en: The man has been infected with cholera.
The spread of cholera alarmed the whole city.
sentences.cn: 霍乱流行使全城的人都恐慌了.

sentences.en: They feared a new cholera pandemic.
sentences.cn: 他们担心新一轮的霍乱大流行。

sentences.en: This is a culture of cholera germs.

words.tran_cn: 霍乱的；霍乱性的；类似霍乱的

trans.tran_en: a serious disease that causes sickness and sometimes death. It is caused by eating infected food or drinking infected water.
